system.description: When you speak out against the status quo before a crowd, tell us what you want of them, then roll +Wisdom.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You rile them up beyond your ability to control. They quickly take their own lead and follow their own desires.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
They will follow your lead, doing as you do.

You rile them up beyond your ability to control. They quickly take their own lead and follow their own desires.

success.label: Success!
success.value: They will follow your lead, doing as you do.
